plot outline: All Chandru ever dreamt of was a happy married life, but things just don't seem to fall in place. But the real trouble is only beginning, and it comes in the form of his lookalike - a crook named Munna. What follows is a series of hilarious incidents, and Chandru has a lot of problem-solving to do if he wants to stay out of trouble.
title: Victory 2
